website_summaries.verdict: Comes with stool, stand, and everything you need to start. Its durability is questionable, though.
pros: Features keyboard with 61 full-size keys, 100 sounds, 100 rhythms, and 30 pre-programmed songs
Comes with stand, sustain pedal, and stool
cons: Keys may stop working over time
The stand does not feel stable

customer_reviews.title: The app with music and teaching is not free!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving a 3 star review because the keyboard bundle in itself is great so far, but it is a flat-out lie that the app with the music and teaching functions is free. You sign up for it before you find out it is only free for 1 week, then you are charged $119.95 for the next year; yes, you are charged the $119.95 all at once the week after you receive the keyboard and sign in on the app.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A key broke all of the sudden
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product new not too long ago, and one of the keys just cracked and broke while I was playing. Is there anyway I can have it replaced? Without this key it is completely useless. Please reply ASAP. See photo attached.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for the price. Along with the free App, it's a great way to learn to play the keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10-year-old granddaughter for Christmas. I had looked at several different keyboards. What I like about this is that it has the mic, stool, pedal, headphones. There is also an App that it recommends to learn the keyboard and you can place your Smart Phone or tablet right on the stand and it knows which keys you're playing. If you put the headphones in, you can play or practice and no one around you can hear anything and the volume in the headphones is a very comfortable level. Considering everything I looked at I found this to be a great bargain considering everything that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Groovin Granny

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Our son wanted a keyboard for his 16th birthday to learn how to play piano as well as make songs for computer games he was designing. We've purchased instruments before. It's easier and ultimately returns more value for the money if you also buy the extras, like a stand and bench. I was happy to find such an affordable kit, and surprised that it works so well. 6+ months later, all the pieces are still sturdy and functioning as intended. I'd buy it again and would recommend it. However, the cord for the AC adapter isn't very long. A power strip can help (and is probably a good idea anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Yack

customer_reviews.title: Great for any Beginner
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult piano learner and this is a great starting point for anyone just learning piano. for the price point i do not think it can be beaten. yes you do not get as sophisticated sounds as you would with a more expensive keyboard but for a beginner it is fantastic. I found that the app Youcisian works much better than the one advertised with this set, Piano Maestro.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Broke right after the warranty ended.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughter for Christmas. After using it for for two months the bottom right corner of the screen began to disappear. And of course this happened AFTER the deadline for product support and return! Don't buy this..... a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I payed for new and got a used item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a brand new item, and I got a second hand one. Everything was throw in the boxn marks on the item! So unprofessional! Se the little parts in the sandwitch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mariann Nagy

customer_reviews.title: BEST beginners keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard for beginners. I bought it for my 6 year old son on his kindergarten graduation and he is so excited to learn how to play! It has everything you'd expect from a good quality keyboard, plus it has a teaching mode! Even my wife and I fight over playing time now. Great price also after having done all the research. Best part of all- it comes with headphones so my son can practice all he wants, as loud as he wants without annoying the rest of us! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bashie kellerman

customer_reviews.title: Usb midi port broke and there appears to be no ...
customer_reviews.text: Usb midi port broke and there appears to be no way to contact anyone to get a new one. I cannot use the piano learning program without a working usb midi port.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 and 10 year old love playing with this keyboard. Heck, my husband and I love playing on it. The headphone option is godsend. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money- in particular, for the beginning player.
customer_reviews.text: With this keyboard you basically 'get what you pay for'. The keys are very light and provide no feedback whatsoever. The keys themselves have a 'toy-like' feel to them. Of course, for this price one doesn't expect professionally-weighted keys or smooth keyboard action. Having said that, for the very inexpensive cost, this is a great value and is recommended for the beginning keyboardist. It would be a good first purchase until the beginning student commits to the instrument and then decides to purchase a better keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Terence C. Mournet, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Will be a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed with the possibilities with this key board. Hopefully I can relearn how to play a piano again. Had piano lessons as a small child (which I certainly am not anymore). Particularly like the ability to attach my tablet to the key board for lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST keyboard for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! I have been playing for two days and I absolutely love this keyboard. If you put it together correctly it’s sturdy. The chair is alright, my butt kept falling asleep because I was playing for hours but I bought this for the keyboard not the chair! The app for it, I highly suggest paying for a membership for it- the learning courses are simply amazing. It makes it fun and easy to learn how to read and play music. HIGHLY suggest this set up!
customer_reviews.author: StacyYvonne87

customer_reviews.title: The best keyboard ever, or what?
customer_reviews.text: This is the second and keyboard I have bought and I couldn't be happier with it (the first one I got from Target and it broke very soon after). My boys love it too. I bought it for my older son, but the little one wants to practice playing too all the time. Plus, the price is right! The warranty was priced well too. We have had and used for about a month. And both of the kids are playing it almost every day. And it still sounds amazing and looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power doesn’t come on anymore after only 6 months but had GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: After only a few months the power will not come on unless you fiddle with the cord for a while then you literally can’t move a thing or it powers off. Tried another adapter and it’s actually the connecting part that is on the keyboard that is the problem. Also stand is pretty wobbly :( UPDATE: I was issued a refund on my order with no problems as I had purchased a protection plan. Changed my review to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money! Keyboard stopped recognizing power source. Won't turn on!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this keyboard for a very few months untik it stopped accepting the battery source plug. It doesn't turn on. We tried to buy a new battery cord but it still won't turn on. Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Salamon

customer_reviews.title: Good buy see the rest of the review!!
customer_reviews.text: Was iffy if this was going to be a decent keyboard. I was very pleased. It shipped quickly and was packaged great. I absolutely love it. Great for anyone who just wants to play music. Not for someone who plays professionally but it is great to teach on or just play because you love it. The stand is not too sturdy, but fine for people who don’t have jumping cats or dogs or kids who don’t have manners lol. Stool is great. Everything was nice except for the head phones which only one ear piece works... don’t waste money on something more unless you want a professional keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Truevet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter kit
customer_reviews.text: The quality exceeded my expectations at this price point. The keyboard is steady in the stand, the stool is sturdy, and the sound decent. I just started learning for the first time, as an adult, to play the piano and am loving it. I can see myself using this for a couple of years, and then potentially upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: XJTexas

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: My 6th grader started band this year and chose to play the piano. Great for a beginner! Also, the headphones are priceless if there is naturally a lot of noise in your home anyway :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and overpriced. you get what you pay for. Spend 40 more dollars get quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Packaging is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Product works and sounds fine, shipping was terrible. We opened the box today to assemble the stand and piano for Christmas and discovered that the keyboard has a giant crack in it. Most likely due to the too large of a box it was shipped in that allowed it to shift and move too much in transit. Disappointed my kid will recieve a damaged present on Christmas morning, but she’ll like it enough. At least it’s still working as far as we can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Hanson

customer_reviews.title: New to the piano!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect thing for a beginner piano player! I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on something until I knew how well the learning would go and how much it would actually get used! So far so good, I like the sound and I love the headphones that help to keep everyone else in the family from having to hear the beginner sessions! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: KMarino916

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price, stand is a little wobbly so just be careful of that. Otherwise GREAT INVESTMENT!
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Missing cross member for stand that piano sits on and one of the fasteners inside of piano to fasten piano down. Piano is fine and works good. Get what you pay for I guess. Update amazon was great with replacing it. Just sent me a whole new piano and I didn't have to send old one back first. The new keyboard came with everything and works good kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This sounds wonderful. I was worried it was going to be more like a toy but it really sounds great. My daughter is really happy and the Santa brought her that out of all things! I like the fact that it comes with headphones so that I don’t have to always listen to it. It has a tempo setter it also has a program where the child can actually play song by a diagram that flashes on the screen showing them which keys to push in time teaching them the song. This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Powell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I think this is great for the price & perfect for beginners. I got this for my 12 yr old son for Christmas & he loves it! My only complaint is that the On/Off lights are reversed. The light turns red when it's on & it turns blue when it's off. It's not a huge deal but it's super annoying. The stand is not very sturdy but we just put it up against the wall & be careful with it. The stool is very sturdy, I was pleasantly surprised for the price. Overall I think this was a great gift that the whole family can enjoy. We are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model because the one I wanted was out of stock. I loved the easy setup, the stickers, and the relative sturdiness. I did not like that their support is impossible to reach. I did not like that I received 2 keyboards that had malfunctioning keys. After I-returned the second one I was not offered a replacement. I bought a protection plan that wasn’t refunded, even though neither the original or the replacement worked. Would not purchase from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Would have bought the better model if I had known better
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5.5 year old for piano lessons. I didn’t want to invest in a full size piano until I knew he wanted to do it for the long term. Now, 10 months later, he’s doing great. So great that his piano teacher says I need to get him a larger keyboard with sensitive keys and a foot pedal. I can buy one by this same company on Amazon for around $150... of course, if I had known this last year, I would have just paid the $30 more for a significantly better model. So, if you are in my same boat, I suggest you upgrade to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeselover

customer_reviews.title: Fair for regular use. Don't go on gigs with it.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it includes a lot. I am a vocal coach so I needed something more reliable then my ancient Casio. I received it timely however on opening the stool broke ( the handle is made of cheap materials so be careful) Headphones are also cheap however the most important things to me are the piano and stand. For the price its fair. I am using it for everyday use not for gigs so fair.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for learning the piano. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad keyboard, in my experience.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with MIDI as I expected. My computer can't even recognize what I'm plugging in and I had to buy a separate cable for another decent bit of money just to test that. And now for some reason, there's a constant buzzing in the background of every note that gets pressed and it's very annoying. This was probably almost not even worth it at all. The keyboard constantly falls backward on the stand. The headphones were also trashed immediately since they're pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sophreni [Reviews on any product]

customer_reviews.title: A piano where the keys do not work.
customer_reviews.text: Not what we thought it would be. One of the keys did not work right out of the box. A simple quality control check would solve that.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M Agostino

customer_reviews.title: Broken, broken, and broken some more
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Christmas present for our sons. To start, there wasn't a power supply when we unboxed it. Then we realized two of the keys didn't work. Less than a week later, the bench broke. Unfortunately we threw out the box so now we have to cart the thing to UPS and buy a box in order to return it. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Korejko

customer_reviews.title: False statements in item description
customer_reviews.text: The information about a free 30 songs is a complete lie. I would not recommend ordering this product to anyone who is thinking that it will help you learn the piano. After a single lesson on the “app” it asked you to sign up for a monthly fee of 20$ a month. What a joke never been more disappointed in a product on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner piano. Surprising quality.
customer_reviews.text: Piano has too many features for me! So cool. Teaching myself piano is fun on this keyboard. I have thin walls, so I plug in my own headphones and the neighbors are saved from my annoying plunking and botched practice songs. Stable stand, great keyboard. I don't use the bench seat and I place the unit next to the wall as the music stand is not durable. And the headphones are cute, and work well, but hurt greatly after 45 mins of practice. I ordered a micro USB to Midi adapter and with my various free apps, I'm able to connect piano to program and learn even faster. Haven't tried their free piano classes. Looked like a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Mombie

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few bucks more on a better product
customer_reviews.text: Obviously you get what you pay for and I didn't expect a whole lot, but it really isn't worth the money. Stand is incredibly unstable. Even against a wall it wobbles so much as to be unusable. No MIDI connection. The sound is really bad, everything sounds off on it. Everything is made from the cheapest possible material. Not worth the money, spend a few bucks more to get something reasonable. However, the bench is surprisingly tough and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: A COMPLETE and total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is complete junk. The keys do not work consistently - you play one key and the ones next to it are likely to sound. Or, you press the key and nothing happens. A COMPLETE and total waste of money. Pure junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first piano
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with this piano , my 8 year old, started his piano classes las week he is only gone to 2 classes and he is already living it. Love the sound of the piano perfect and steady chair that comes it is , loveeeee the headphones 🎧, that way he can practice all he wants without disturbing anyone in the house
customer_reviews.author: isela

customer_reviews.title: After a few months there is a static noise in ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few months there is a static noise in the background that makes playing very difficult. It's a loud static hum -we have tried new power supply and new batteries but the noice is still there - very distracting when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: arrived with malfunctioning key
customer_reviews.text: Probably would’ve been a great item if it didn’t arrive with keys that didn’t function. Also immediately after buying it became unavailable so I was unable to ask for a replacement which was a bummer. It was for a birthday present and she didn’t even get the chance to enjoy it fully.
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaLife

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I am an 80 yr. old who was trying to find something to pass y time these days. I played piano a LONG time ago and also clarinet. This unit is perfect for my needs. Sound isn't too bad and so far so good. I enjoy getting back to practice and passing time in a somewhat constructive way. Well worth the money. Very reasonable priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works. Notwithstanding, mine arrived smashed up.
customer_reviews.text: I did not open this until 2 months after I purchased it. I had to make room and it was a timing conflict, and I was past the return date. When I opened it, it was rattling on the inside of the keyboard. I looked around there were black pieces of plastic in the bag and I shook the keyboard and all these additional pieces fell out. I look along the sides of the keyboard and one side is smashed in. It works and everything but there is a giant hole on the left side of it. Drives me crazy so it sits there. This keyboard would be badass otherwise. Don't let this deter you.
customer_reviews.author: Andy A.

customer_reviews.title: Radio frequency interference
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner and was excite to learn how to play the piano. The keyboard was easy to set up, the chair is comfortable. Once i plug in, there's an interference with radio frequency playing in the background. I tried difference outlets in the house, away from antenna and cell phones, nothing worked. The background noise was distraction for me to learn. I've googled and looked around in the reviews, it doesn't appear to be a common problem for most. I even called Amazon support, no one was able to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peng

customer_reviews.title: Keys are different than a real piano
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that the actual keys on this keyboard are smaller than a regular piano key. Also, the keys are not weighted. It is good for young players to work with weighted keys because they are similar to a real piano, these keys have a much softer push and will not develop the hand muscles in the same way. So if you are looking to start of a young piano player before you commit to purchasing a real piano, try and find a keyboard that has the weighted keys.
customer_reviews.author: Ariella Vaccarino

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, one key doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Opened keyboard, set it all up, started to play and one of the keys doesn't work! If you push on it really hard it may work....it may not. I'm really disappointed after setting this all up, that I now have to disassemble it and ship it back!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No response from customer support
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard seems to be working well far, however the packaged arrived with missing parts (no head phones) I’ve reached out to the customer support email provided on multiple occasions and have received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B.

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It's a relatively cheap keyboard, and the speakers can't handle the volume higher than 4 when you press more than a couple keys at once. It's also not weighted so you can't adjust the volume of a note by pressing it harder or softer. That being said, I think it's great for beginners, both kids and adults. We have an 8yo who wanted to learn how to play, but good keyboards are expensive. This is perfect for her to learn on and we can get a better one when she outgrows it. Overall it's a good value if you're wanting to learn, but it just doesn't cut it for intermediate or advanced players.
customer_reviews.author: jen86

customer_reviews.title: Cool keyboard with lots of tones and rhythms
customer_reviews.text: I love my new keyboard, I've played other instruments, always wanted to learn to play the keyboards/piano... The stand is a little wobbly and one of the thumb screws on the stand was stripped, but this didn't detour me giving it all 5 stars...
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: Nice little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old daughter learning to play the piano. This has served her well and will grow with her. She is getting fairly good with her lessons and she has enjoyed having this to practice on. Of course her teacher suggested a keyboard that had keys that bounced back like a real piano, but those are not cheap. For the price, this is probably one of the best you can get. We also bought her a foot pedal to learn with as well and it easily plugged into the back and works nicely. It has lots of other fun features to play with.
customer_reviews.author: JSKW3

customer_reviews.title: Few keys lost sound after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It is a good starter's keyboard. Although there are many functions, my kids don't use most of them. Good sounds quality, however, 5 keys lost sounds after 6 months. Luckily, they are almost to the end of the keyboard, not the major C keys. we continued used few months and decided to get a new one. It serves the purpose with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Z Wang

customer_reviews.title: Connecting iPad Pro to rockjam without connections on back of keyboard
customer_reviews.text: How does anyone play the free app simply piano that is offered when you buy this rockjam keyboard when there are no MDI or poor connections on the back. This unit has only the basics. Jack plug in, microphone plug, and earphone jack. Are there other items that can be purchased to connect my IPad Pro so that I can use my apps to play on this unit? They should not offer a free app simply piano if you can not use it on this keyboard. Does anyone have suggestions
customer_reviews.author: Katiecat

customer_reviews.title: Has the WOW Factor! Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: We just recieved this! The Absolute Perfect Gift for my son. It teaches you the keys on a Keyboard. Has many features and definitely has the WOW factor! For the price you can’t go wrong. It comes with headphones and a bench but it’s not adjustable- no biggie. It has stickers you can place on the keys to help learn. I love this item so much I highly recommended it to my moms group. It arrived fast and it’s in perfect condition. I did add the $15 4- year warranty just for piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Patty34

customer_reviews.title: It's mediocre, but it's cheap and has all the parts.
customer_reviews.text: You won't like playing it. You won't want to record with it. It's mediocre, but it's cheap and has all the parts. Yes, you actually get everything you need to play in one box. Just plug it in. You can buy one of these and stick it somewhere just to punch notes. It's not good enough to be temporary-permanent or permanent-temporary. It's a cheap, temporary solution. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Daygone(dot)com

customer_reviews.title: It is a great, quality built keyboard and sets up so quickly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Granddaughter's 8th birthday. It is a great, quality built keyboard and sets up so quickly. Her mother did order some stickers for the keys so that helped her learn "Happy Birthday" within a few minutes. She will be starting her piano lessons and this is going to be so helpful for her to practice on. Definitely would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Excelnoww

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Am really impressed with my new RockJam RJ761. It came securely boxed and all parts were there. It went together quickly. The stand is sturdy and the seat is well padded. Most impressive is the keyboard itself. Very professional looking. The sound is superb. I was concerned about the quality but feel I got my money's worth. My only complaint is since I'm a beginner, I wish there had been more explanation on what buttons controlled what rhythms and tones. And how does one get to the installed lessons? Also the free training is not available for use in my Kindle tablets. Maybe Amazon can fix that, hint hint!
customer_reviews.author: bubba

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. When it first arrived a lot of keys weren’t working so I had to take the whole thing apart and fix it manually and after I did that I gotta say It’s ok if you’re just starting piano and if you need something to learn beginner songs with but the keys don’t sustain notes for more than 2 seconds so once you getting into learning songs with more than half notes it becomes useless. It does come with some cool features but I think it’s better to buy a better piano for more money
customer_reviews.author: kyle pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: The only complaints I have are the sound quality is basic, and the stool is uncomfortable. Other than that it is a well priced keyboard for beginning piano learners. The key range is perfect for jumping right in and taking you through basic to more professional levels without breaking the bank on something fancier. Overall it is a perfect fit for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Geeklord

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT SHIPPED
customer_reviews.text: It would simply not turn on, period! Just to make sure it was not the adapter was damaged, I bought 6 batteries which did not help. I than ordered a new adapter and still would not turn on. Wasted 3 hours on assembly and returns and another hour on runs to the store to buy the batteries which I have return as well . I looked cheap when I opened it. Never again Rock Jam!! It was basically a piece of Rock indeed!
customer_reviews.author: The Manga Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Great Setup For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. Not full 81 key range with 61 keys but does the job to teach beginners. Not the most sturdy but great for the price. Keyboard is limited on sounds that start to sound nearly the same but acoustic piano sounds fine. Again perfect for beginners to see if they stay with lessons or not. Once serious, upgrading will be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: mpowerme

customer_reviews.title: Half the keys stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, purchased July 15th, and here we are. Gently used too. Half of the keyboard is no longer registering, and it doesn't wake from standby on those non-working keys.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: NOT A 5 STAR KEYBOARD
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent unit, a good bang for you buck, it will be fine for my aspiring 7 yr old daughter. We had a Casio small keyboard and the quality on the Casio is definitely higher. However gave this unit 5 stars review, clearly has never been to a 5 star hotel or steakhouse. With that being said, it’s a solid 4 star unit.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself is alright. It sounds like it's slightly out of tune, but it works. The stand provided, however, is A JOKE. It was not designed well, so you HAVE to lean the entire thing against a wall or it will fall over backwards. To be perfectly honest, I would say find a different brand and don't spend your money on this one. It's worth maybe half it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Milam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for my granddaughter and love that you can learn from your ipad!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pasche

customer_reviews.title: Was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.text: I should have known that it was too good to be true to buy a decent keyboard without paying $300+. It's week 3 and the left speaker does this fuzzy sound thing EVEN when no key is getting pressed. I been practicing everyday for about 30 minutes and I would not have suspected that the quality would go so low so fast. It's almost discouraging. I had really hope that I would get some bang for my buck here after researching for day but I should have known better I suppose. Would not recommend. It's heartbreaking. Get you a good keyboard with midi capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Sound is adjustable, lots of extras as far as percussion options and different instrument options. Great to learn with serval app options. Comes with head phones and you can adjust height. Can plug in your phone. Great for someone just starting out. However I’ve had mine for two months and when I hit middle C the key next to it also plays very frustrated and would return it if I could because of this technical issue. Good value hopefully this flaw will not bother me too much.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: For kids mostly
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good for a young child. The sound is not the greatest, and sounds like a high end toy. The letters on the stickers began to wear off after two weeks. The keys make a lot of noise and it takes away from the music. One key stuck from time to time, but not always. The bench and stand are actually pretty stable. Easy to put together. I must say that the owners manuel was the easiest manuel I have ever used in my life. Very step by step and clear as daylight! I'm going to fork out the $800 for a really good one. So, you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: LEENER126300

customer_reviews.title: UMissing materials to attach keyboard to stand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Rockstar for my son to take Piano Class in school. He really likes it and I really like the fact that it came with headphones so he can do class, practice and i can't hear it. I would have given it a five except when unboxing and setup; i realized the company seller/company did not supply enough 5x40 thumb screws that the directions was calling for to complete the setup to attach the keyboard to the stand. However the sound quality so far is great for what it going to be used for.
customer_reviews.author: CHELLEBMAYO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Daughter when she was 3. Perfect size, great quality, inexpensive, we’ve had it for almost 3 years now, end her baby sister uses it and she’s not soft at all, I am amazed by the durability of the material used to make this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: AL88

customer_reviews.title: Nice sounds, but few issues.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard in question was rather nice and it has some excellent settings on it to really get one into the art of finger dancing. However, my headphones that I got with it went out in one ear on the second day of use and the keyboard is rather light, so it's easy to push over, so I've had to add weights on the end. The electronic interface has some issues in respects of the notes are just slightly above where the should be at multiple angles, so learners may have to rewire their brain to try and figure out the differences between an A note and B note positioned on the scale. Overall nice sound quality, though.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Dilworth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful beginners piano
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up after reading reviews. The key weight is moderate and good to earn on for those not used to stretching and pressing their fingers. The SimplyPiano code is a bitch sketchy. Ended up buying it without using the code because of the way it’s confusingly written and paid full price :( aside from this, it’s a nice piano. The chair is comfortable. Headphones are tight on my head. I have a big head.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mackintosh

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, but some keys went out in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Nice set up for the price, and my son seemed to really like it as he was/is learning how to play piano (he’s very good at John Legend’s all of me). My only issue is in less than a year a couple keys just stopped working. Very dissatisfied that some keys stopped working so soon especially since it’s still somewhat new and was being used properly with lessons, not just something a kid is pounding on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working two days after I could not return it
customer_reviews.text: It was WONDERFUL until the power stopped working and it wouldn't play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this keyboard for our 4-year-old grandson. He will be starting piano lessons this year so we needed something with a stool, a stand, 61 keys, and a Sustain Pedal. This definitely had everything required and more! The sound is wonderful and he loves to play with all the different beats. If you are looking for a quality musical instrument, you will be more than happy with this. If you are looking for a toy, this probably would not be a good product for you.
customer_reviews.author: CJH

customer_reviews.title: Bringing Families Together
customer_reviews.text: My children love it. Video games now take a back seat to this piano and they put YouTube on to challenge each other to learn a new song and the best part is they do it together. So Happy. Now do get me wrong they still play their video games but it's so much easy to get them off the video game with out the attitudes and sighs of how Mom is ruining their world. Lol....
customer_reviews.author: Janice T- Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this item. I was going to save it to give as a gift but decided to open it to make sure everything g was there. To my surprise. The keyboard is broken into pieces. The box looks like it’s been thrown around and I’m completely pissed.
customer_reviews.author: marley777

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my kids. Their ages are 14, 7 and 3. The set up was easy and everything was packaged perfectly. Well except the stickers that go on the keys. Those were wrinkled a bit and when I needed to stick them in the keys one or two of them were folded. Other than that the sound is great the headphones work and everyone in the family is learning how to use it. It was the best present I got my kids they are working together and not fighting. I loved the price of the product and the quality is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it zero stars I would - I was excited about the low price but the first one we received had a broken key (the key was snapped off). Had to package the WHOLE THING (break down the seat, the stand - everything) back up and send it back for a replacement. When the replacement arrived we set it up - multiple keys wouldn’t even work when pressed. Now having to package up and send back once again! This time not even bothering with a replacement, two defective products and hauling a 30 lb item to the UPS store twice in three days is definitely not worth the savings on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Rose Martin

customer_reviews.title: RockJam RJ761 61 Key Electronic Interactive Teaching Piano Keyboard , Superkit (RJ761-SK)
customer_reviews.text: HELP... Our keyboard arrived and we enjoyed it for 2 days. Now when plugged in the screen just flicker and nothing happens. I'd rather we heard from someone to trouble shoot this problem; than re-box and return. I did reach out to the AMAZON automated bot for assistance, but it's communication on trouble shooting and problem solving is limited. PLEASE HELP
customer_reviews.author: LESHA HENDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent learning tool
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it. Only bad thing is that out was delivered kinda delayed but is will with the wait. Great product, great sound, excellent learning tool in this covid-19 world.. Some of the songs in the first few lessons are quite fast. I do believe having slower songs first will help with learning the notes faster and then increase the tempo as one becomes proficient. But it's great nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fun Keyboard to use.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this little keyboard, it is easy to use with a lot of sounds and rhythms. The keys are a little stiff at first but I got used to it. It's nice that it includes a stand, not hard to put together at all, and headphones plus bench!
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 10 yr old son on his birthday. He absolutely loves it! There are so many options to change the sound of the keys and the LCD screen makes learning new songs fun. I appreciate that this keyboard came with stickers to show which keys were what so my son could start practicing right away. I would definitely recommend to any child if they are interested in music. The keyboard itself is made well and sturdy. Even includes a bench seat! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea bush

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages ... especially 68 year old beginner
customer_reviews.text: At first I was hesitant to purchase this piano because I thought it would be too small for me. But, to my surprise, it works well with me and my grandchildren. I'm the beginner with the piano; they are teaching me to play and I'm enjoying every minute of it. They love this piano so much that they will drop their instruments (flute and clarinet) to practice with me. The headset is great because it allows you to practice quietly.
customer_reviews.author: vmosley

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 13 year old daughter for Christmas last year. This keyboard seemed to be good quality when we put it all together on the stand it turned on and worked. After two weeks it stopped playing sound unless the headphones were plugged in. She still uses it but no one else can hear what she is playing when she does finally get that song down. I wouldn't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Play Maestro!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 4 year old grandson and he absolutely loves it. I was pretty impressed with this keyboard and the comprehensive package that it came with. It's a great learning tool and provides lots of musical fun. My only disappointment is that there does not appear to be an option for a sustain pedal. That probably won't matter to my grandson, but I would have liked that feature. That being said, it's still worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Mis

customer_reviews.title: No screw-holes in stand - unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The stand was a main reason I got this package rather than just a keyboard. I have a very small house and it's easier to have it on the stand as opposed to finding a place to store it. The stand came without the screw-holes so I couldn't even set it up. I've contacted the company and they asked for proof of purchase and it's been 5+ weeks since I even heard back. If I could send it back, I would but I recycled the box the same week I got it so I could store it. I didn't find out the stand wasn't usable until I went to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Quality sound
customer_reviews.text: We are almost a month in an this far I’m impressed. Unlike some other reviews I find the sound to be spot on. My son is 8 and taking piano lessons. He loves this new piano. The application that offers free lessons quickly converts to a $19.99 monthly charge. With that said he loves it and has progressed much faster using it. The piano incorporates his phone. I think this addition makes it more interesting to children versus the traditional books and lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Burk

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'd give 4.5 stars if I could, but I rounded up to 5 because overall, I like it. My major complaint is not being able to connect a pedal. The sustain feature helps but it's definitely not the same. Also, the keys dont push in as smoothly as on other, nicer, more expensive keyboards. But again, overall, this is great if you just want something cheap and handy to keep up your piano skills or to get kids started. I use it often and it's easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N.

customer_reviews.title: Good starter Piano
customer_reviews.text: comes with easy to assemble chair and stand. They had provided stickers and instruction to put it on. These stickers are very useful for learning. It had some free classes and online subscription which was good. Sound quality is very good. Headphones which came free are decent. Overall i would recommend this product for any beginners.
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for kids just starting out. It seems very lightweight and cheap though. It works well but I don't know that it will be very durable. The headphone jack came loose the first day off use, just from bumping it against something. We can still use it, but have had to tape it in a certain spot for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Knee

customer_reviews.title: Issue about a month in. Customer support nonexistent.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give it 5 stars or talk to customer support, but I’ve been unable to find any way to contact the company about this. The keyboard worked for a month or two before it started making this awful wavy buzzing sound. It makes it whether I am using the speakers or using the headphones, so I don’t think it’s a speaker issue. Really just wanted to get in contact about this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this. I bought this for my daughter's birthday and it had a broken key. I requested an exchange which was relatively easy and came quick however the second one has a broken key too!! I can't believe it. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lane

customer_reviews.title: Piano is great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Piano is great for the kids, not I regretted the keys are not touch sensitive. I bought this a few months back and we all benefitted from the screen showing notes when the keys are pushed. I’d give five stars but the bottom of the bench snapped when I sat on it.... I’m not a heavy person so it was a bit of a shock!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Once side with volume and other press keys stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard sound is now on high and you can't lower it. Nor can my grandson use headphones because of the loud sound. He was not abusive to the keyboard. It just stopped working and it is too late for Amazon to do anything about it. Very disapppointed with the product and would not recommend it. I am waiting for a response from the company, but since they are in the UK and would probably have to pay for shipping it seem unlikely I will get the fixed and therefore have to buy a new one. It will not be from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Nye

customer_reviews.title: Great for my girls!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters for Christmas. They love it! They've had lessons before so it was fun to play songs they could remember. It's not very stable, the stand is very cheap but we put it in a corner so it's supported a bit. It has lots of fun functions and sounds pretty clear. I wouldn't buy this if your kids are serious about piano but I think it's a great musical toy!
customer_reviews.author: jenlively

customer_reviews.title: I really like this keyboard! I am a beginner and it's just right for me.
customer_reviews.text: I rent a small room and it doesn't take up much space. It also came with headphones, so the neighbor won't say it's to loud. the only thIng that bothers me are the back support for music sheets and books , it's real flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: William Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Many teaching aids
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7 and 9 year old and this keyboard is perfect. Sound quality is great, you can add an amplified speaker, headphones, microphone. Teaching demo screen works well, my 7 year old is already playing a song. The stool is great quality and sturdy enough for me to sit in at 220 lbs. I would recommend this for anyone looking
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird 78

customer_reviews.title: Last 1.5 years, just past warranty... stopped working
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it, but the little bench broke within a month. They said they would send a new on but never did. About 1.5 years later, would only work if you carefully hold the power cable in. Bought a new power supply, but no change, it was the piano. Then it just stopped working. Warranty is only 1 year so they said “sorry”.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zarzycki

customer_reviews.title: Not for big teens/adults
customer_reviews.text: Okay so, this is definitely for a young kid or tween. I’m 27 and it’s a bit too “kiddish” for me. The size is fine but the sound makes it seem like a toy. Also not super sturdy on carpet so make sure it’s on a non-carpeted surface. Overall it’s not bad because it gets the job done but if you’re an adult trying to learn, spend a little more money on something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: MARILYN BAEZ

customer_reviews.title: Quality package worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard and the stand/seat was worth the price. Good for beginners and there are many settings and features that can be explored. The one month of free Simply Piano classes was helpful, the app is simply wonderful. Without any music knowledge, I was able to read the music symbols and notes within couple if days!
customer_reviews.author: Resh

customer_reviews.title: first piano
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old daughter learning to play the piano. She is getting fairly good with her lessons and she has enjoyed having this to practice on. great value. great first-time keyboard for the kids very good for learning the piano. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chiu

product_meta.title: RockJam RJ761 61 Key Electronic Interactive Teaching Piano Keyboard with Stand, Stool, Sustain Pedal and Headphones (RJ761-SK)
product_meta.description:
Style:61 Key Keyboard Superkit With Sustain Pedal

The Rockjam 761 Keyboard Super Kit includes a 61 key full size keyboard, a sturdy adjustable stand, a pair of high quality headphones, a sustain pedal and a comfortable and durable stool perfect for use in the home, on stage or in the studio and represents the perfect all in one package for beginners, students and educators alike.

The keyboard itself is highly adaptable and features 30 demo songs, 200 sounds and 200 rhythms with built-in teaching functions.

Additional features include record and playback settings that will allow you to record unto notes, your LCD display will show the this is reached by indicating FL.

All the functions and features on the Rockjam 761 Keyboard Super Kit are easily accessible and clearly labeled by a illuminated and highly responsive touchscreen.

The RockJam 761 is the perfect entry level product for an aspiring musicians. Choose from a variety of sounds - including piano to piccolo, organ, and many other orchestral instruments.

The Rock Jam 761 keyboard also has 3 different effects and controls (Effect, Control And Accompaniment Control) helping you add more style and really fill the sound of your music.

You can also play chords from a single key and learn and understand how chords are constructed. Easy To Use On-Board Practice / Teaching Functions The on-board practice / teaching functions help you to fill your sound and play along with the main melody. With the rhythm programming function, you can construct a backing to your pieces that will help further inspire you
feature_bullets: The RockJam 761 keyboard piano superkit Includes a digital keyboard with 61 full size keys giving you that traditional piano feel whilst maintaining a portable and compact design that can be powered by either mains (power supply included) or batteries

This RockJam 761 keyboard piano features a touch display panel that both displays feedback and engages the 200 rhythms, 200 tones, a teaching function and 30 demo songs that are Part of its functionality

The RockJam 761 keyboard piano has record and playback functionality allowing you to build layers to your sound and the midi output integrates with your digital audio workstation like Ableton and logic via a single cable
This keyboard piano superkit package includes a keyboard stand that is sturdy in design and can be adjusted to suit keyboard piano players both young and old
This keyboard piano superkit contains padded seat that is easily folded and has a thick padded seat for hours of comfortable play
This keyboard piano superkit package includes a pair of padded headphones so you can practice in privacy and without disturbing others
In addition to all this, the RockJam keyboard piano superkit contains a sustain pedal making it perfect for constructing any composition you wish
Exclusive access to content within the Simply piano application for both iOS and Android devices to assist keyboard piano players both young and old
Key note stickers are included within the keyboard piano package that are both easy to fit and giving you a visual indication of the right keys to play

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,488 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
